CLI for ConfigurationÂ¶

Aviso can also be used to store and retrieve configuration files for external applications. In this case it acts as a configuration management system.

These two functionalities, notification and configuration, share the same server technology and architecture, and therefore most of the user options. This section presents the commands available with the configuration CLI.
